dataTemplate.name: XXSCNIAR
dataTemplate.description: OD: SC Needs Improvement Alert Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT distinct OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER , OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME , OD_SC_VEND_TYPE , OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS , OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT , OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER , OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME , OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN , OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN , OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION , OD_SC_MX_SUB_RGN , OD_SC_ASIA_REGION , OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN , OD_SC_DEPARTMENT , OD_SC_PRODUCT , OD_SC_MERCHANT , OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D , OD_SC_VEND_REGION , OD_SC_CIP , OD_SC_FOB_VALUE , OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D , OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT , OD_SC_INSPECTION_TYPE, OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO GSO_SUPPLIER_ID, OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO GSO_FACTORY_ID, OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS GSO_SUPPLIER_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v WHERE ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODUS' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_eu_vendor_master_v WHERE ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODEU' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_mx_vendor_master_v WHERE ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODMX' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_asia_vendor_master_v WHERE ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODASIA' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) ) t1 WHERE od_sc_str_audit_result = 'Needs Improvement' AND OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D IS NULL AND OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT IN ('LF','ODGSO') AND OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS = 'Active' AND (OD_SC_CIP IS NULL OR OD_SC_CIP = 'No') AND (OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D - (nvl(XXSC_REP_PKG.get_schedule_date(t1.od_sc_vendor_name,t1.od_sc_vendor_number,t1.od_sc_factory_name,t1.od_sc_factory_number),OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D))) >540
